data.actual_result: The list jumps to the top
data.expected_result: The list should still show the last server
data.short_description: The server list jumps to the top after changing screen orientation
data.steps_to_repro: - Be member in some servers such that you have to scroll a bit to reach the last server - Scroll down to the last server - With the channel drawer still open change your screen orientation from portrait to landscape (or vice versa) - Observe the server list
